message.title: Seeds Are Not Free of Charge
message.content: While you are sowing, the price of the seeds is automatically subtracted from your capital.

message.title: What Do You Want to Sow?
message.content:
In the career mode you can select the seed types as you like. The following are available: wheat, barley, canola, corn and grass.
In this tutorial, you are limited to barley.
